sourceDesc.p: The contents of this document are generated from HGV Translation XML.

revisionDesc.change: Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
Crosswalked to EpiDoc XML from both

div.p: – – – und ein 1/2 Teil gemeldet für die Haushaltsmeldung des [vergangenen 14 Jahres], in denen [niemand gemeldet wird]. (2. Hand ?) Hiermit reiche ich (die Meldung) ein. (1. Hand) [Im 15. Jahr des Aureliu]s Antoninus Ca[esar, des Herren], am 3. Schalttag des (Monats) Mesorê. (3. Hand) Ich, [N.N.] alias Ammônios, aus der Gruppe der von der Steuer befreiten Sieger bei den Heiligen Spielen, habe (die Meldung) eingereicht.

– – – and a half I register for the house-by-house registration [of the past 14th year], in which [no-one is registered][] (m. 2 ?) Therefore I submit (this registration). (m. 1) [Year 15 of Aureliu]s Antoninus Ca[esar, the lord], Mesore intercalary day 3. (m. 3) I, [NN] alias Ammonios, one of the class of victors at the sacred games who are exempt from taxation, have submitted (this registration).
